Title: Eccles Cakes, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons butter 1/4 pound currants 1 ounce candied orange peel diced 1/4 cup light brown sugar 1 lemon zested 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice 1/2 pound frozen puff pastry thawed 1 egg white lightly beaten granulated sugar for dusting, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F. Grease a baking sheet. Melt the butter, remove from the heat and mix in the currants, candied orange peel, sugar, lemon zest and allspice. On a lightly floured work surface, roll out the puff pastry and cut out 8 x 4 inch discs. Distribute the filling between the center of each disc. Brush the edges with egg white and seal. Turn over and lightly roll with a rolling pin. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Brush the tops with egg white and sprinkle with sugar. Make 3 slits in the top of each cake then bake for 15 mins, until golden. Allow to cool on a wire rack. Serve warm or cold. Will keep for 1 week in a sealed container.
references: Title: 葡萄干蛋糕, Ingredients: 1. 2勺黄油 2. 100克葡萄干 3. 30克蜜饯橙皮丁 4. 55克黄砂糖 5. 1 个柠檬皮 6. 半勺五香粉 7. 225克冷冻酥皮（需要解冻） 8. 1个蛋清，将其打泡 9. 用于撒粉的白砂糖 , Steps: 1. 将烤箱预热至 425度。在烤盘上涂上黄油。黄油融化后，关火，加入葡萄干、蜜饯橙皮、糖、柠檬皮屑和五香粉，做蛋糕馅儿。 2. 在操作台面上撒点面粉，然后擀酥皮，并将其切成 8 x 4 英寸的圆盘。在每个圆盘的中心之间加入蛋糕馅儿进行填充。在每个蛋糕圆盘边缘刷蛋清并密封。然后翻面，用擀面杖轻轻擀一下。 3. 将做好的蛋糕放在准备好的烤盘上。在顶部刷上蛋清并撒上糖。在每个蛋糕的顶部切出 3 个切口，然后烘烤 15 分钟，直至呈金黄色。放在铁丝架上冷却。热的或冷的都可以。做好的葡萄干蛋糕放在密封容器中可以保存一周。

Title: Fruitcake, Ingredients: 1 lb candied cherry (green or red) 1 lb candied pineapple 14 lb citron (I use 8 oz. mixed fruit) 12 ounces brazil nuts (cut each whole nut into 5 pcs.) 2 lbs pecans 2 (15 ounce) boxes raisins (1 golden and 1 dark, I use both golden) 12 lb dates, cut up 2 cups butter, at room temperature 3 12 cups sugar 10 large eggs or 12 eggs, if eggs are small, at room temperature 1 cup wine (Morgan David Blackberry Royal) 4 cups all-purpose flour (sift flour with the following spices --) 1 12 teaspoons cinnamon 1 12 teaspoons allspice 1 teaspoon nutmeg 1 teaspoon clove 1 12 teaspoons baking powder 1 14 teaspoons salt, Steps: Cut up fruits and nuts. Either soak overnight in 1 cup of wine or flour nuts and leave overnight. I soak fruit in wine. Makeup cake batter- Cream butter and sugar. Then add 1 egg at a time until all eggs are added. Then add flour. After beating batter good, pur batter into pan with nuts and fruit and mix well. Line pan with brown paper sack or wax paper. Just line the bottom of the pan. Grease paper with oil. Bake 1 1/2 to 2 hours at 250 degrees. My cakes took 4 hours. Check cakes after 1 1/2 hours to see if cakes are light brown. Cakes should bake until darker. When cakes are done cool on rack in pan. Use knife on sides to loosen after cakes cool. Soak cheese cloth with wine and place on cakes. Wrap cakes and store in cool place. Cakes should be soaked 3 or 4 times.
references: Title: 水果蛋糕, Ingredients: 1. 适量樱桃 2. 适量菠萝粒 3. 适量橙子 4. 50克巴西坚果粒 5. 50克山核桃 6. 50g葡萄干 7. 适量黄油 8. 6个鸡蛋 9. 1杯葡萄酒 10. 4杯普通面粉 11. 适量肉桂粉 12. 适量豆蔻粉 13. 适量泡打粉 14. 适量盐, Steps: 1. 将准备的樱桃、菠萝粒、橙子、坚果和山核桃切碎，并混合均匀 2. 把切好的水果和山核桃放在红酒中泡一晚上 3. 开始制作蛋糕面糊，将鸡蛋打入容器中，并搅拌均匀。 4. 少量多次加入面粉，并不断搅拌。搅拌均匀后，将面糊倒入带有坚果和水果的烤盘中，并再次搅拌。 5. 将棕色纸或者蜡纸铺在烤盘的底部，并刷上一层油，防止糊底。 6. 将烤盘放进烤箱中，250度烘烤1个半小时或者两个小时。 7. 待颜色为浅褐色后取出，蛋糕应该烤到颜色较深的状态。 8. 蛋糕冷却后，用刀子在侧面切开，并用葡萄酒浸湿干奶酪片，然后铺在蛋糕上。 9. 将蛋糕储存在阴凉的地方。

Title: Marble Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. sugar 1/2 c. butter 1/2 c. milk 1 1/2 c. flour 2 tsp. baking powder whites of 4 eggs, Steps: Cream butter and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Add the milk and mix well. Add flour and baking powder. Mix well. Beat egg whites until stiff and fold into mixture. Pour mixture into a greased and floured 9 x 9-inch pan, keeping a small portion of batter in mixing bowl. Drop 4 to 5 drops of red food coloring into remaining mixture. Mix well and drop by a spoonful at a time over the mixture in the pan. (This makes the marble effect.) Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until done. If desired, frost with favorite frosting.

Title:  marble 蛋糕

食材：

1/2 杯糖
1/2 杯黄油
1/2 杯牛奶
1 1/2 杯面粉
2 茶匙白醋
4 个鸡蛋，蛋白 2 个

步骤：

1. 将黄油和糖搅拌在一起，直到糖完全溶解。
2. 加入牛奶，搅拌均匀。
3. 加入面粉和白醋，搅拌均匀。
4. 打发蛋白至硬挺，然后将其倒入混合物中。
5. 将混合物倒入九九乘以九的方形烤盘中，保留一些面糊在碗里。
6. 在剩余的混合物上滴入 4 到 5 滴红色食用色素。
7. 搅拌均匀，然后用勺子将面糊倒在烤盘中的混合物上，造成大理石效果。
8. 烘焙至350°F（约175℃）45 分钟或直到熟透。
9. 如果喜欢，用喜欢的奶油霜霜饰面。

Title: Sponge Cake, Ingredients: 1 c. flour 2 tsp. vanilla 1 tsp. almond 2 Tbsp. water 1 1/4 c. sugar 7 egg yolks 7 egg whites 1/4 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar, Steps: Sift flour once, measure and sift 4 times. Add water and 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla and almond to egg yolks and beat with mixer until very thick and light. Add flour all at once and stir until just blended. Beat egg whites and salt with mixer. When foamy, add cream of tartar. Continue to beat until egg whites are stiff enough to hold up in peaks, but not dry. Add remaining 3/4 cup sugar. Fold in egg yolk mixture. Bake in ungreased tube pan at 325° for 1 hour.

references: Title: 法式洋葱汤, Ingredients: 1. 5勺 切成薄片的洋葱（1 1/2 磅） 2. 3勺 黄油 3. 1勺 植物油 4. 1 勺 盐 5. 1/4 勺糖 6. 3勺 面粉 7. 3勺 罐装牛肉汤 8. 3勺 开水 9. 1/2 勺 不甜的白葡萄酒 10. 盐和胡椒粉调味 11. 2 勺 瑞士奶酪，切碎 12. 16（1/2 到 1 英寸）法式面包片 13. 1/2 勺 磨碎的帕玛森芝士 14. 1勺融化的黄油, Steps: 1. 在厚底锅中用黄油和油慢煎洋葱 15 分钟。 2. 加入盐和糖搅拌。 3. 用中火煎 35 到 40 分钟，不盖盖子，搅拌直到洋葱变成深金黄色。 4. 撒上面粉；搅拌 3 分钟。 5. 关火；将沸腾的肉汤和水加入洋葱混合物中。 6. 混合均匀。 7. 加入酒和调味料。 8. 小火部分覆盖，35 分钟。 9. 在炖汤的同时，将 1 层法式面包片放在饼干纸上，以 325° 烘烤 30 分钟或直至它们变干并呈金黄色。

题目：法式洋葱汤，配料：

5 薄片洋葱（约 1 1/2 磅）

3 汤匙黄油

1 汤匙植物油

1 茶匙盐

1/4 茶匙糖

3 汤匙面粉

3 (10 3/4 盎司)牛肉汤罐头

3 杯沸水

1/2 杯干白葡萄酒

盐和黑胡椒调味

2 盎司瑞士芝士，切丝

16 (1/2 到 1 英寸)法棍面包片

1/2 杯帕尔马干酪

1 汤匙融化黄油

步骤：

1. 用厚底烤盘，将洋葱片平铺在上面，放入预热至4.00°C的烤箱中烤 15 分钟。

2. 在大碗中，将黄油、植物油和盐混合在一起，搅拌均匀。

3. 将黄油混合物倒入洋葱中，用中火炒 15 分钟，直到洋葱变软、金黄色。

4. 加入糖和面粉，继续翻炒 3 分钟，直到面粉金黄色。

5. 移开火源，加入牛肉汤和葡萄酒，搅拌均匀。

6. 在锅中加入 3 杯沸水，盖上锅盖，用中火煮 35 至 40 分钟，期间不断搅拌，直到洋葱变得很软。

7. 在煮洋葱的同时，将 1 层法棍面包片放在烤盘上，用 325°C 烤 30 分钟或直到其变干、金黄色。

8. 在洋葱汤煮好后，将法棍面包片放在上面，淋上融化的黄油。

Title: Tasty Lamb Kebabs, Ingredients: 3 lbs boneless leg of lamb, trimmed of fat and cut into 1-inch chunks 12 cup freshly squeezed lemon juice 1 tablespoon olive oil 3 cloves garlic, minced 12 teaspoon ground cumin 12 teaspoon ground oregano 14 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 large red bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 1 large green bell pepper, stemmed and seeded,and cut into 1-inch squares 12 lb small fresh mushrooms, cleaned and stems removed, Steps: The night before, marinate lamb: In a large glass or plastic bowl, place lamb chunks. Lay two slices of cooked ham with a slight overlap on a sheet of cling film on a chopping board. Spread half of the duxelles over the slices in an even thickness. Place the fillet steak on the duxelles. Coat the steak with the mustard. Add the remainder of the duxelles to the top of the steak and then the remaining two slices of ham. Wrap the cling film around the steak and refrigerate for up to 24 hours. Roll out the pastry and wrap the steak roll completely. Use egg yolk wash to seal the pastry and then coat the pastry completely. Fork over the top of the pastry. Preheat the oven to 180 degC. Place the Wellington on a baking tray and bake until brown, turning once. Allow to stand for 10 minutes then carve and serve with beef gravy if desired.

Title: Duck A L'Orange, Ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon olive oil 2 boned, skinned duck breast halves (about 8 oz. each) or 1 lb. boned, skinned chicken thighs 1 red onion (7 oz.), peeled, halved, and thinly sliced crosswise 1 cup orange juice 2/3 cup fat-skimmed chicken broth 1/4 cup orange marmalade 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon red wine vinegar 1 orange (8 oz.), rinsed, halved, and very thinly sliced crosswise (end pieces and seeds discarded) 1 cup couscous 1/4 cup medium-size green olives such as Picholine, pitted and coarsely chopped Salt and pepper, Steps: Pour olive oil into a 10- to 12-inch nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Add duck breasts and cook, turning once, until well browned on the outside and barely pink in center of thickest part (cut to test), 12 to 15 minutes total. With tongs, transfer duck to a rimmed plate and cover with foil. Add onion to pan and stir often until limp, about 5 minutes. Add orange juice, broth, marmalade, lemon juice, vinegar, and orange slices; boil, stirring occasionally, until mixture has thickened and is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in a 1- to 2-quart pan over high heat, bring 1 1/4 cups water to a boil. Stir in couscous, cover, and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Title: Madeleine, Ingredients: 2 Eggs 80 grams Granulated sugar 100 grams Cake flour 1/2 tsp Baking powder 100 grams Unsalted butter 1 half a lemon's worth Lemon zest (you can substitute this with lemon oil), Steps: Combine the flour and the baking powder, then sift. Zest the lemon and melt the butter in a microwave. Crack eggs into a bowl, add the sugar and beat well. Add the flour and the lemon zest and mix until well combined. Add the melted butter in 2-3 doses, and mix until it is well incorporated and the batter is glossy. Cover with plastic wrap and let it rest in the refrigerator for 1 hour~6 hours. You can leave the whisk in the bowl. Prepare the mold while you let the batter rest. Use a ball of plastic wrap and use it to spread shortening on the mold (no need for any flour! ). Or, use a ball of plastic wrap to spread some butter (just the amount left in the bowl that you used to melt it would be enough) on the mold, chill in the refrigerator, then sift some cake flour on it (dust off the excess flour). Mix the batter until it is smooth, then fill the mold by about 80% (I used two spoons). Pop large bubbles with skewers, etc. Bake at 180C for 20 minutes, then remove immediately from the mold and cool. Once they have cooled to room temperature, put them in a bag to keep them from drying out.

Title: Pancake Souffle, Ingredients: 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 cups all-purpose flour 1 pinch salt 1 1/2 cups whole milk 6 eggs, seperated 1 cup chocolate chips 8 tablespoons sugar sliced fruit, to top with, Steps: Make sure you have a 12 inch iron skillet. preheat oven to 400 degrees. in one bowl combine egg whites and beat on high adding sugar until it forms stiff peaks(this sugar is seperate from the listed 8 tablespoons ). in another large bowl combine egg yolks flour milk sugar vanilla salt and chocolate chips( if wanted). Then fold in whipped egg whites Heat skillet on high with 1.5 tablespoons butter and pour in mixture and top with fruit if desired. Immediately place in preheated oven for 15-20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from pan and top with powdered sugar and slice like a pie and enjoy(you Can also top with maple syrup).
references: Title: 舒芙蕾, Ingredients: 1. 1勺香草精 2. 2 杯面粉 3. 1 小撮盐 4. 1 1/2 杯全脂牛奶 5. 6个鸡蛋，蛋液分离 6. 1 块巧克力片 7. 8勺糖 8. 切片水果 9. 适量黄油, Steps: 1. 准备一个 12 英寸的铁锅。 2. 预热烤箱至400度。 3. 在一个碗中混合蛋清并加入糖，高速打发直至形成硬峰。 4. 在另一个大碗中混合蛋黄、面粉、牛奶、糖、香草盐和巧克力片（如果需要）。 5. 然后拌入打发的蛋清 6. 用 1.5 汤匙黄油加热煎锅，倒入混合物，如果需要，在上面放上水果。 7. 立即放入预热的烤箱中烘烤 15-20 分钟或直至呈金黄色。 8. 从平底锅中取出，在上面撒上糖粉，然后像馅饼一样切片享用。
prediction: 香蕉布丁蛋糕，配料：1茶匙香草提取物 2杯普通面粉 1茶匙盐 1 1/2杯全牛奶 6个鸡蛋（分离），打散 1杯巧克力 chips 8汤匙糖，切水果，顶部装饰，步骤：确保你有12英寸的铸铁煎锅。将烤箱预热至400度。在一个碗中混合鸡蛋白蛋白并将其打至硬峰（这是与列表中的8汤匙不同的糖）。在一个大碗中混合蛋黄、面粉、牛奶、糖、香草提取物和巧克力 chips（如果需要）。然后将打散的鸡蛋白蛋白倒入锅中，加入混合物，顶部可添加水果。立即将平底锅放入预热至400度的烤箱中，煎约15-20分钟或直到金黄色。从锅中取出，顶部撒上一层糖粉，切成像 pie 一样。你还可以在顶部使用 maple syrup 装饰。

Title: Lemon Tart, Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 4 12 tablespoons sugar 5 tablespoons butter, softened (not melted) 1 egg 1 teaspoon vanilla 18 teaspoon salt 5 eggs 6 ounces sugar 3 lemons, juice of 1 orange, juice of 2 lemons, zest of (grated outer peel) 5 tablespoons butter, Steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. 1. Combine dry ingredients for crust in a bowl. Cream in softened butter. 2. Beat egg with vanilla and salt, and blend into batter. Form into shallow eight-inch straight-sided tart pan (a pie pan also works, but not as well). 3. Cover the tart dough with aluminum foil and fill with about a half-cut of dry red beans or pie weights. Place crust in preheated oven and bake with beans for 10 minutes. (This keeps sides from caving in, and the bottom from bubbling up.) Remove foil and beans and bake another five minutes. Cool crust. Reduce oven heat to 325 degrees. 4. Start the filling by beating the eggs. Blend in sugar slowly. Stir in juice, followed by lemon zest. 5. In a saucepan, melt the butter but don't let it get hot. Stir the butter into the egg-lemon mixture. 6. Pour the filling (it will be very liquid) into the tart shell, and put it in the center of the 325-degree oven. Bake 20 minutes. Allow to cool. Serve with garnish of fresh raspberries or strawberries.
references: Title: 柠檬塔, Ingredients: 1. 适量低筋面粉 2. 适量糖 3. 适量黄油 4. 6个鸡蛋 5. 适量盐 6. 3个柠檬，挤成汁 7. 1个橙子，挤成汁 8. 2个柠檬的柠檬皮（磨碎的外层柠檬皮）, Steps: 1. 加入软化的黄油，并打入1个鸡蛋，充分搅拌均匀。 2. 少量多次加入面粉和糖，并加入适量盐，并充分搅拌均匀。 3. 将面糊倒入烤盘中，将烤盘放入烤箱中烘烤10分钟。 4. 取出烤盘，将饼皮冷却至室温。 5. 现在开始制作柠檬馅料。在碗中打散5个鸡蛋，逐渐加入适量糖、柠檬汁和橙汁，并加入适量柠檬皮，充分搅拌均匀。 6. 将融化的黄油慢慢倒入柠檬蛋液中，充分搅拌均匀。 7. 将制作好的柠檬馅料倒入冷却好的蛋液中，再次放入烤箱里325度烤20分钟。 8. 取出烤盘，将柠檬挞冷却至室温。 9. 可以点缀一些覆盆子或者草莓。
prediction: 柠檬塔，配料： 1杯通用面粉 2汤匙通用面粉 4汤匙糖 5汤匙黄油，软化（不融化） 1个鸡蛋 1茶匙香草精 18茶匙盐 5个鸡蛋 6汤匙糖 3个柠檬，汁 1个橙子，汁 2个柠檬，外皮汁 5汤匙黄油 步骤： 预热烤箱至350°C。 1. 将干配料倒入碗中。用黄油奶油混合。 2. 打散鸡蛋，加入香草精和盐，搅拌成蛋液糊。将蛋液糊倒入有深边、浅边、直径约8英寸的直边圆形塔模中（也可以用派盘，但不如圆形塔模效果好）。 3. 用铝箔盖住塔模，用干红豆或派的重量填满。将塔模放入预热的烤箱中，烘焙10分钟。然后取下箔片和豆子，再烤5分钟。冷却塔模。 4. 从打散的鸡蛋中加入盐和糖，慢慢搅拌。加入橙子和柠檬的外皮汁。 5. 在平底锅中融化黄油，但不要让黄油变得热。将黄油倒入蛋液混合物中。 6. 将混合物倒入塔模中，将塔模放入预热至325°C的烤箱中烘焙20分钟。待冷却后，从冰箱里取出，用水果作为装饰。

Title: Hearty Vegetable Soup, Ingredients: 2 lean meaty soup bones (preferably beef shank) 1 c. each: any 5 vegetables: sliced carrots, diced celery, sliced zucchini, sliced green beans, sliced leeks, sliced parsnips, chopped cabbage and peeled and cubed potato 3 qt. water 1 can tomatoes, cut up 1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt 1/2 tsp. seasoned pepper 1 c. barley 1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms, Steps: Brown soup bones either in skillet over high heat or in 400° oven. Combine all ingredients except barley and mushrooms in large soup kettle; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered, 2 hours. Add barley; simmer 1 hour longer. Add mushrooms; simmer 10 minutes. Remove soup bones from kettle; let cool slightly. Remove meat from bone; cut meat into pieces and return to soup. Refrigerate overnight. Skin any fat from surface; reheat soup and adjust seasonings before serving.
references: Title: 蔬菜汤, Ingredients: 1. 2个番茄 2. 2个辣椒 3. 适量蘑菇 4. 适量盐 5. 1根胡萝卜 6. 1个土豆  7. 1个卷心菜, Steps: 1. 将食材洗净，把胡萝卜、土豆切丁，卷心菜、番茄切丁 2. 烧水，导入切好的蔬菜 3. 煮大概10分钟，等水沸腾即可开小火加盐调味。
prediction: 适应中文烹饪文化的改编版：心旷神怡的蔬菜汤，配料：2根猪里脊骨（最好使用牛肉骨），5个蔬菜：切好的胡萝卜，切好的芹菜，切好的黄瓜，切好的西兰花，切好的菜苗，切好的洋葱和切好的土豆，3杯水，1个中罐头番茄，1/2茶匙盐，1/2茶匙黑胡椒，1杯大麦，1杯切好的新鲜蘑菇，步骤：将猪骨用旺火在炒锅中煮熟，或者用200°C的烤箱烤20分钟。将所有食材除大麦和蘑菇放入大汤锅中；加入足够的水，煮沸。降低火力，盖上锅盖，煮2小时。加入大麦；再煮1小时。加入蘑菇；再煮10分钟。从锅中取出骨架，让其稍微冷却一下。将肉从骨头上切下；将切好的肉切成小块并重新放入汤中。放入冰箱冷藏一晚上。将汤中的油脂部分从表面去除；再次加热汤，并根据需要调整盐和黑胡椒的味道。

prediction: 巧克力奶油蛋糕，配料： 1/2 杯可可粉 3/4 杯沸水 1 3/4 杯筛过的蛋糕面粉 1 3/4 杯糖 1/2 杯油 1 茶匙 baking powder 6 个鸡蛋（分离蛋黄），分开 1 茶匙盐 1 茶匙香草精 1/2 茶匙柠檬酸 步骤： 将可可粉放入沸水中溶解。冷却后用筛子将干性材料混合在一起。加入油和分离的蛋黄，搅拌均匀。加入香草精和柠檬酸，搅拌均匀。将打发的 egg whites 和奶油芝士混合在一起；打至硬直立尖。将蛋糕面糊倒入 10 英寸圆管蛋糕模中。在蛋糕上放巧克力奶油蛋糕（见上方配方）。

Title: Pumpkin Scones, Ingredients: FOR THE SCONES: 1 cup Flour 2 Tablespoons Dark Brown Sugar 1/2 Tablespoons Baking Powder 2 teaspoons Pumpkin Pie Spice 1/4 teaspoons Salt 1/2 cups Canned Pumpkin Puree 2 Tablespoons Pumpkin Spiced Coffee Creamer 1/4 teaspoons Vanilla Extract FOR THE MAPLE GLAZE: 1/2 cups Powdered Sugar 3 Tablespoons Maple Syrup 1 pinch Pumpkin Pie Spice, Steps: Preheat the oven to 425°F and line a baking sheet with a silicone mat or parchment paper. In a large mixing bowl, whisk the flour, brown sugar, baking powder, pumpkin pie spice and salt together to aerate them. Gently stir in the pumpkin puree, coffee creamer and vanilla until a soft dough starts to form. Turn out the dough on to a clean, floured surface. Knead the dough for 4 to 5 turns to bring it together into a uniform ball. Gently flatten the ball and pat it out into thin circle. Use a knife to cut the circle into 8 equal wedges. Do this by quartering the circle and then cutting each quarter in half. Transfer the wedges to the lined baking sheet and bake the scones for 14-15 minutes. While the scones bake, prepare the simple glaze. Simply combine the powdered sugar, maple syrup and pumpkin pie spice in a shallow bowl and stir it all together until it becomes a smooth glaze. When the scones are done, take them out and let them cool on the sheet for a minute. Take each slightly cooled scone and dip the tops of them in the glaze to coat them. Transfer them to a rack to finish cooling. Make sure there is a sheet of aluminum foil underneath to catch the drippings. It makes clean up so much easier. Serve with some great tea or coffee for an amazing breakfast treat or afternoon snack!
references: Title: 南瓜饼, Ingredients: 1. 1杯面粉 2. 2 勺红糖 3. 半勺泡打粉 4. 2勺南瓜派香料 5. 适量盐 6. 半杯南瓜泥 7. 2 勺咖啡奶精 8. 适量香草粉 9. 适量糖, Steps: 1. 将烤箱预热至 425度，在烤盘上铺上硅胶垫或羊皮纸。 2. 在一个大搅拌碗中，将面粉、红糖、泡打粉、南瓜派香料和盐搅拌在一起，使它们通气。轻轻搅拌南瓜泥、咖啡奶精和香草，直到形成柔软的面团。 3. 把面团放在干净的、撒了面粉的台面上。将面团揉 4 至 5 圈，使其揉成一个均匀的球。轻轻地压平球并将其拍成细圆圈。用刀将圆切成 8 个相等的楔形。 4. 通过将圆四分之一然后将每个四分之一切成两半。将楔子转移到有内衬的烤盘上，烤烤饼 14-15 分钟。 5. 烤饼烘烤时，准备简单的釉料。简单地把糖粉、枫糖浆和南瓜派香料混合在一个浅碗里，搅拌在一起，直到变成光滑的釉状。 6. 烤饼烤好后，将它们取出，放在烤盘上冷却一分钟。 7. 取每个稍微冷却的烤饼，将它们的顶部浸入釉料中以覆盖它们。将它们转移到架子上以完成冷却，确保下面铺一张铝箔，它使清理变得容易得多。
prediction:
南瓜酥饼，配料：

- 1杯面粉
- 2汤匙黑暗 brown 糖
- 1/2汤匙烘焙粉
- 2茶匙南瓜派香料
- 1/4茶匙盐
- 1/2杯罐装 pumpkin puree
- 2汤匙南瓜香草奶油
- 1/4茶匙香草提取物

地图糖浆，配料：

- 1/2杯糖粉
- 3汤匙枫糖浆
- 1茶匙南瓜派香料

步骤：

1. 预热烤箱至 425°F，并在一个涂有硅胶垫或黄油纸的烘焙盘中铺上网状格子或防粘毛巾。
2. 在一个大碗中，用搅拌机把面粉、糖、烘焙粉、南瓜派香料和盐混合在一起，搅拌均匀。
3. 慢慢地加入 pumpkin puree、coffee creamer 和香草提取物，搅拌至成为一个柔软的面团。
4. 将面团倒到干净、湿润的表面。用手将面团搓成球状，然后压扁成平片。
5. 使用刀将球状面团切成 8 个等份。将每份面团对折成一个半球形。
6. 将半球面团折叠后切开成 4 个等份。
7. 将切好的半球面团转移到预热的烘焙盘中部。
8. 把 maple syrup 和 pumpkin pie香料混合在一起，倒入平底锅中，用中火煮至混合物变成琥珀色并起泡。
9. 把南瓜酥饼移到烤盘上，然后滴上 maple syrup glaze。
10. 把酥饼放入预热的烤箱中，烤 14-15 分钟。
11. 当酥饼烤好时，从烤箱中取出并让它们冷却在一张铝箔上。
12. 把酥饼两面沾上 maple syrup glaze。
13. 将酥饼放在烤盘的底部，重复以上步骤，直到所有的酥饼都沾满 maple syrup glaze。
14. 把酥饼放在烤盘的底部，然后用锡箔盖住它们。
15. 把酥饼放入冰箱冷藏 10 分钟，让它们变硬。
16. 取出酥饼并放在平面上晾凉。
17. 酥饼做好了，可以享用这款美味的南瓜酥饼了！
